name: conditions_documenting_substance_misuse
title: Conditions documenting substance misuse
publisher: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)
description: Any finding or condition that indicate problematic misuse of a substance other than tobacco
purpose: Identification of patients that have a documented substance misuse condition
